website_summaries.verdict: One of a few car seat cushions that offers both heating and cooling elements for all times of the year.
pros: Seat features dual zone heating for the best personalized warmth possible
Cooling function ventilates sweat in hot temperatures
cons: The built-in cooling fan can protrude, causing some discomfort if driving for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the Northeast winter
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and the seat coushion fits well on my wife's car. This thing gets warm fast! I measured the time from I plugged in the power and turned on the heating, ~1 minute the cushion started to turn warm and ~3 minute I can feel the heat. That is well beyond my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: It just feels good, man! Nothing can be wrong if it feels good
customer_reviews.text: It got my attention because of its price, pictures and good reviews. I bought it about one month ago, and today I had nothing else to do in the evening, thus decided to come and write a review, and try to amuse myself and future customers. The picture doesn't depicts all the cool feeling that I have felt and touched with my butt. It provides fast ventilation in the cooling mode and great comfort for driving, especially long distance. The Mesh design was well thought such that the seat can have enough ventilation without the stickiness. I haven't tried the heating function because it is dog days of summer now:) Shipping was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Will Norskov

customer_reviews.title: Great product for relaxation
customer_reviews.text: Just brought this cool/heat cushion for BBQ party. Placed on the camp chair and enjoyed an absolutely relaxation experience.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The good: It worked for heating and cooling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2010 suburban. The good: It worked for heating and cooling. The bad: the fan portion doesn't hang down on my seat since my seat is a bit larger than most cars. So it protrudes out, preventing me from sitting with my legs closed. The seat itself isn't very comfy, it's pretty stiff and the material used is pretty abrasive. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nameless

customer_reviews.title: A very nice air seat.
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought one cooling seat cushion with the other brand but I had bad experience. It was okay but became blocked when you sit on so I have to return. For this new one, The built in force air is way too perfect. It does not have blocking issue at all when I sat on. Strong wind stream keeps me dry and cool all the way. Luxury fabric mesh material fit my new leather car seat well. All in All awesome product with great price.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works well. Was shocked at how well you can feel the cooling fan. The heat is good also, but cuts off to soon for my taste. Seems to be very well made also. If it has a flaw it is the cooling fan . It is a tad to loud. You get used to it, but you never like it. I bought this for my observatory chair . It gets hot in summer and cold in winter in the observatory. This chair helps with both really well. I have had it for 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: great with a few frustrating issues.
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great for those of us that have vehicles w/out heated/cooled seats. I have a fairly loaded GMC Sierra but because it has a bench seat in the front that deletes heated seats. My issue with this is the seat bottom is just a tad short for the size of a full size pickup it hangs at a bit of an awkward angle due to the fan being needed for the cooling process. My other issue is there is not built in timer, this runs off a 12v adapter; if you forget to turn it off you're draining your battery (if you're 12v doesn't turn off when you shut down your vehicle).
customer_reviews.author: R. Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Works well but doesn't give off much heat
customer_reviews.text: I'm always freezing in the winter. I just bought a car that doesn't have seat heaters. The cushion looks fine, fits my Honda Accord well, but doesn't give off as much heat as I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: mail lady loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the mail lady. She has very little heat in your mail truck. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: VLHallTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Must have for non-heated/cooled Seats!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've been searching for for years! It's large enough that it feels like it's the whole chair. It "sticks" to the chair well enough that it doesn't slide around. I really like the material it's made out of. Most importantly the heat and cooling features are fantastic. My only complaint is it's not very comfortable at first but either I've gotten used to it or it just had to "break in" a little after a few days. Either way, I've been using this all week in freezing temps and it's been working like a champ. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: actually makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and the heat here is crazy - plus i got a black car - so its like getting into hell every time i get inside my car. this car seat really speed up the cooling process - my back is dry and not sweaty - and I feel like my whole body is getting cooler faster. happy i took the chance on it
customer_reviews.author: Benjo Hamo

customer_reviews.title: Anyway the warming is great. The bottom portion of the seat is lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Got this just in time for the cold weather. It works very well for warming. Tried the cooling, but it didn't seem to do much. Anyway the warming is great. The bottom portion of the seat is lumpy, needed more padding on each side of the fan. There are 2 settings for heat and 2 for cool. The lower heat setting is perfect for me. It comes with a cord to plug into a car cigarette lighter and also can be used in the house with the charger. I love this, wish I had bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: This is much better than I expected and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than I expected and is very comfortable. I used this in my car seat to cool my body. I had an old cushion with similar cooling function but it was broken. Besides, the old one was too cold to sit on in the winter. You know what it means in Minnesota!!! This new cushion perfectly solve the issue because it offers heating as well in the winter. Noted that it will add height if you use it , so please consider the height difference and adjust your seat accordingly!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Huwang

customer_reviews.title: May work for little people.
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great but the product...eh. worked for about 2 weeks and then blower slowed dramatically and cushioning broke down so air could no longer circulate. Not good for big people.
customer_reviews.author: LtLeary

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand how people can literally write lies. I purchased this based on the reviews. My car has no ac and this doesn't cool in 90 degree weather. The small fan at the bottom a joke. I could only feel air coming out of it and other areas if you place your hand directly on it. The cushion is comfortable. The heat component works but the cool down is just a complete waste of money. I am returning. I would never write a review based on lies. Please do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tbar

customer_reviews.title: Cooling works great
customer_reviews.text: We've had it about 3 or 4 weeks now and my girlfriend loves it. It works much better than the one she had purchased for her van. My car has factory heated seats but not cooled and NC summer drives are often uncomfortable on the sunny side of the car. The Snailax seat cushion keeps her cool even on long trips and even helps with hot flashes. Don't know how durable it will be but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Josie's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a while. I have 2 and my daughter got one for Christmas. Even in a hot car, it helps to relieve the sweat on my back. I would say to stick with the original version. I tried the deluxe version and didn't like it. The 4 fans right in the small of my back made it so I felt like I wasn't fully in the seat, like I might slip off the front. The original (standard) works great though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: It blows air on hot days !!
customer_reviews.text: it blows air well enough to cool me off on hot days, airflow to the upper back part is slightly lacking for obvious reasons. The heater works well, gets too hot for me on the high setting. The lower front part that is tapered could be slightly more tapered so it doesn't hit my legs as much. Material is a little coarse and not very comfortable, but a trade off I am willing to deal with for the cooling feature of this. Does not do anything for support and like I said, it takes away a slight bit of comfort from the stock seat due to the materials being used.
customer_reviews.author: RandyMan

customer_reviews.title: Dual use seat warmer / cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. I got this for my wife to use when driving my car. She is happy with the warning. I don't use it but I did try the cooler thinking forward to the summer. That works real nice as a ventilated seat cooler! I'd buy this again. The price I'd reasonable for the convenience of both heat and cool. It dies raise the hight of your seat about 1-2 inches. You might need to adjust your seat hight. Not a bug deal unless you cannot adjust your seat and are very tall. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: a2zllc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooling seat cushion. Got this for my husband (commercial driver) he gets hot in the warehouse loading his truck, then takes a while to cool down once back in the truck. This cooling seat cover allows him to cool off and not have a sweaty back and butt while driving. It really works well - actually better than we expected. Instantly cools you off and drys your back side when sweaty from working in this hot Florida summer. Take a little effort to get it installed (used some extra zip ties) but it is well worth the $$ and effort. Excellent product and would highly recommend to all drivers. Very comfortable and super cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because I wanted a massage function as well. But if you don't need that then this product is perfect. As soon as i saw it didn't have massage I decided to submit a return claim, but then tested it anyways, why not? The heat function: I waited about 1 minute after turning it on and it felt warm to the touch. Then I sat in it and it was toasty after an additional minute :) Turned it off to allow temp to neutralize. The cooling function: Impressive! I've never had cooling seats in my cars but wow what a difference this would make. It cooled seat very well and back ok.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lubek Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: It's recommended by my colleague. The winter in Penn is long and harsh. Our office doesn't have central heating system. We only got two space heaters that are not sufficient at all. I bought this simply just for making myself more comfortable. We both used this product for a couple of weeks. It heats up pretty quick and has the auto-off function. It's easy to use with only 3 buttons. If you expect anything fancy, it doesn't come with it, but with the heating and cooling function, it should be sufficient. The only downside is that the bottom fan blocked me from pulling the whole thing higher.
customer_reviews.author: Yy

customer_reviews.title: A cushion exactly what I really want.
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is made of high quality materials and the heating and cooling worked perfectly fine and comfortable for me. I had a cooling pad before but the noise of the fan is a killer, The fan noise of this pad is much acceptable while working fairly quiet. I like the combination of the cooling and heating together which I do not have to remove it during the summer/winter if only cooling or heating function with it. It took me about 5 min to attach it on the car seat. The lower level of heating took about 1 minute to heat up. I am very satisfied with this pad so far.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this seat cover July 31st, about a month later the cooling function is complete crap. The fan comes on but only at low speed and is very loud. When I turn my truck off the fan speed actually changes it self to high as works properly with little noise but with the engine running I only get noisy low speed. The heating function works randomly and is not dependable. I would rather have this seat cover with an analog switch and no heating function but I didn’t see that option. It is a complete pain in the butt to have to remember to turn the seat on every time I turn on the engine.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Not Universal Fit. Seat length 17" Back length 23"
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Good heating and cooling Cons: - Scratchy material - Too small I've been searching around for a good seat cover with cooling fans, this wasn't the solution for me. I have a Hyundai Santa Fe and a Mini Cooper and this didn't fit in either car despite it being listed as a "Universal Fit". In fact, I would wager this won't fit properly in most cars. For those of you looking around for measurements, the length for the seat bottom portion is 17" and the length for the back is 23". If your seat is any larger than that the front fan won't hang down properly and gets in the way of your seating position.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My work truck was killing my back so I ordered the Seat Cushion for the heating feature and it works great. I haven't had to use the cooling feature yet, but the fan seems to work great and it moves the air nicely. Overall, the cushion appears t be well made and looks great. I'll update my review in a year to let you know the longevity. For now, it is an awesome upgrade to my work truck.
customer_reviews.author: EricinHuntersville

customer_reviews.title: I love the item
customer_reviews.text: I love the item. I run a crane for a living. Got tired of having swamp butt. This thing knocks off the edge of being miserable. My AC is less than par. Negatives: A design flaw: the flap covers the air entry point to the fan. I’m thinking of simply cutting it out of the way. The fan could have some more push. When you turn it on YOU WILL KNOW IT. But it is what it is. I haven’t tried the heat. A must have for the person who wants no sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installation easy; function fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Installation easy; function fantastic I have used this cushion for a while on the car seats, chairs and bed. Installation is piece of cake. It has elastic strip to hold it on the place where it should be or place it flat on the bed. My husband and I used that to control the temperature where we sit on: cooling heating cooling heating cooling... Significant feeling of temperature change and good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: A good cool seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several kinds over the years and I really like this one I use it for my office chair and it comes with the adapter for your car or your house. I'm a big guy and it keeps my bum and lower back from sweating the air flow is so far really good. I haven't tried the heat setting yet. The on off switch is on about a 18" cord. The fan can be a bit loud on hi but I find it a good trade off and most of the time I can use low or medium anyway. Thinking about getting one for my car too.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cooling
customer_reviews.text: The cooling of this seat is great, it is perfect for Florida, where even with the AC running my back still gets a little sweaty/sticky. The little fan at the bottom doesnt stick out too much or get in the way. The heating on colder days also works well and gets warm in about 2 min. But the cooling of the seat cover is what really sets it apart.
customer_reviews.author: sportsboy3

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as advertised, good cooling
customer_reviews.text: This has really good airflow and is pretty comfortable. I was pleasantly surprised how much cooling I felt. However, it says it is 19 inches wide and it’s actually 16 inches. This matters because I put this in my car and I was looking for cooling and coverage for my car seat. The seat is starting to wear out a bit and I wanted coverage for that. 19 inches would cover, 16 doesn’t. Therefore, the cooling ability is a moot point and I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Best car accessory I have ever bought! My new to me vehicle hase dark grey seats, which get very warm in the summer sun. I got this in hopes of make those summer drives cooler, especially while waiting for the A/C to kick in. My seat cover arrive right before a spell of weather with temperatures in the 90's, perfect timing! Anyway, we I stalled the seat cover, plugged it in, and turned it on and felt the cooling effect immediately! The only issue I have found is how to arrange the power cord and the control so the don't get lost under seats or block cupholders. A minor price to pay for a cool seat though!
customer_reviews.author: Katt13

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I get so hot sitting in my chair while at work. This product has a fan that hangs down below the front edge of your chair and blows air into the cushion. But, once you sit on the cushion there is nowhere for the air to go other than to your knees. Very disappointed. The cushion is supposed to be able to provide heat. I did not test that part out. Also, this cushion has to have access to electricity, so if you have to move in your chair it is rather difficult to maneuver around the cord.
customer_reviews.author: S. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to car with no seat warmers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my truck as it was starting to get cold. So far it has lasted through a ton of heavy use as it is on each time I get in my truck. It heats up very fast and keeps me warm! I have not tried the vent feature yet but if it works as good as the heating pads then I'll be in heaven! Good product and would recommend to anyone looking to get this for their car.
customer_reviews.author: Xerc

customer_reviews.title: Coooooool breeze..
customer_reviews.text: Install was a breeze. Functions as advertised. Can def. Feel the air especially of you run your ac. Seems to be alot more in the butt portion than the back area but the fan is closest to seat so that's the nature of the beast. Remote is easy to operate and the heat (though I've only used it briefly to test it worked) was pretty impressive. Reason for 4 stars..the material is cheap. I do not see this lasting long in the butt area due to sliding in and out of truck.
customer_reviews.author: Brush WolfTop Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: Quickly heats and cools
customer_reviews.text: I have used both the cool and heat settings and it works great!!! I use it on my office chair. When I come in to work in the morning, the outside temperature is usually around 30 degrees. Heats up quickly to warm me up! Later when the temperature rises and I’m working hard, I use the cooling feature and the cooling works quickly too! Fan is a little noisy, but I do not notice it when I’m working or listening to music. It sounds like background noise. I would like the top back strap to be a adjustable and longer, but I did know it was not supplied as so when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice cool breeze
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this seat cushion! No matter how hot my leather seats are in the summer, I hit the switch, the control cord could be a little longer tho, and turn the fan on high, and I NEVER sweat going to town or on long trips like I take a lot. The heat part works really fast also. I have had it a few months, seems to be holding up even with my heavy weight. Best cushion and cooling cushion out there, definately worth the money. I will buy another when or if this one wears out!
customer_reviews.author: pilot 9099

customer_reviews.title: Died within a few months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these mostly for the winter season and by January I started having issues with the controller auto shutting itself off. Pressing the power button and selecting the heated or cooled option has the same effect. The moment I set down the controller it just turns back off. I am sure there is a fault somewhere but I believe you only get a 90 day warranty with these. Just so happen to die right out of warranty. I bought two so the passenger one works at the very least but I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. The seat warming function in great, and it heats up fast. I was initially not sure about the cooling function, but am actually surprised by how effective that little fan is. It pumps air through the seat cover quickly and actually provides relief on hot days. Only suggestion is that i wish the fabric on the seat cover was softer. Great product so far. I will report back in a few months
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Guivehchi

customer_reviews.title: Cooling effect of Seat cover is exactly as promised!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter purchased this east cushion for my birthday,I installed it in my 97 Dodge Dakota 4x4 Pickup. it went onto the factory hi-back bucket with no fitment issues in about 5 minutes. cooling feature is great in my non-air conditioned truck. haven't had a chance to try the seat heater feature yet,but am looking forward to doing so when the weather turns colder. this product so far is everything that the literature promised.
customer_reviews.author: BkSmith

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's winter, and my car doesn't have the button for heating cushion, so been wanting to get this to warm me up in the morning when I go to work/back from work. So far it actually works better than I thought! I like that it fits my Ford car well, it has no weird smell, it's portable and very easy to use. The heated seat cushion starts heating almost instantly. I also tried the cooling option, and it can get really cold. For the price, this product works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: ZRJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the heated seat option. This thing is amazing. I tested it yesterday to see if it even worked. It has two cooling settings. I really thought that the cooling would be a unless thing. I was amazed that it worked really well. Cannot say how durable it is, I know it came with some kind of warranty and a satisfaction guarantee. If it only lasts thru the winter I will be happy because it is not expensive. I will buy more for the kids seats.
customer_reviews.author: George from Atlanta Ga

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this thing slightly heats and cools depending on the mode obviously; but this is what perplexes me: I know safety is a concern, but it has a built-in 30 minute timer before it shuts off? This means every 1/2 hour you have to turn it back on. Also, the cooling unit, an enormous bulky sack down below (*sigh) is a thick noisy fan. HOWEVER, does this do it's job? Yes. And with a little finagling you can strap it onto your standard office chair. In all, the problem is the built-in timer (the mesh covering is somewhat uncomfortable too).
customer_reviews.author: Skyyzzamm

customer_reviews.title: Cool your buns
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Coachella Valley, one of the hottest places on earth. The sun makes the inside of the car hot enough to cook a pizza. When I get in the truck I am often a bit sweaty as it is so freekin hot outside. I turn this thing on and immediately my back down to my knees are cooled off by air blowing on me. The little fan that runs between your knees puts out enough air to cool you off. I love this seat cover. I purchased two and both of them work tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Newby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: After five uses the wire in the cigarette lighter adapter stopped working. I notified snailax about the issue and they sent me a new adapter within a few days. Awsome! Works great. Just enough heat to help with my back pain. Wish the fan on the bottom of the seat pad wasn’t so big... Not good for short legs. Other than that, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer millman

customer_reviews.title: Wonky fan
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought had a terrible noise in the fan, so I returned it. The replacement item works pretty well, but sometimes when I first turn it on at its highest speed, the fan doesn't run very hard, but eventually it does blow lots of air through the seat cushion. Even without high speed air, this cushion is more comfortable than sitting on hot leather, and when the air does circulate, I'm much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mcfandrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the intensive heat!
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of my time in the car, going from one client meeting to another. Temperature in the summer is average 100-104 fahrenheit. This seat is a blessing for my back. No longer am I worried my lower back is covered in sweet. Occasionally I would have in my trunk a spare shirt and undershirt. Highly recommend it! Only Conl I'm about 1.83 meters, so an extra inch from this almost made my head touch the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Madero

customer_reviews.title: My Prime Day Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this seat pad for about $30, and it is worth every penny. My only complaint is if I sit back into it hard enough,I can feel the pieces digging in my back. This happens with everything I imagine though. When the heat wave hit this past weekend and it showed up, it was like St. Peter gave me wings.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett E.

customer_reviews.title: Great one, like it
customer_reviews.text: Great one, like it. I just got this product and I can't wait to install it. It fits perfectly the seat of my car, the back straps secure the cushion in place very well. When I turned that on immediately it comes with cold air. Soon I felt like sitting on the ice. Do you guys know the "Coors light beer" Ad? That is exactly same feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Luxury is a heated seat in the winter time.
customer_reviews.text: I love my heated seat when it is really cold. However, lately it is hard to see the light that indicates it is on. Of course, the heat gives the indication iit is on. But I want to see the light. A couple time I have lost track of the controller, while driving, so its hard to turn it down in those circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dressel

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews unless a product exceeds or fails to meet expectations. This product is much better than expected. I use it for my desk chair. The shift from 12V to 120V is a no brainer. The air flow is very good. The fan is easily accessible should it need to be replaced, and it is the only moving part. As the fan is a basic desktop computer fan, it would be easy to source parts. The design is really solid.
customer_reviews.author: Johnawc

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised. Does a great job moving air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I am less-than-able and spend a great deal of time sitting in a chair. I have not used the heating function but I did use the cooling function on the recent really hot days. It really does the trick. I found that there was enough air circulating so that the heat was manageable. I find the fan location a bit inconvenient as I crochet blankets and they get in the way of the fan. The fan is very silent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Coenen

customer_reviews.title: Staying Cooler in the Mail Car
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a mailman on a rural route. He rides in a car with the window going up and down all day and often comes home with a sweat soaked shirt on the back from sitting in the hot car all day. This new seat cushion has helped him stay cooler and so far he loves it. The seat is very comfortable and helps to keep him much cooler by circulating air between the car seat and his back and bottom. We have been looking for something to solve this sweaty problem and now we have. Great Seat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but wears out quick
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the seat exactly a year ago and used it everyday. I drive a truck all day and my back would get sweaty. It does cool, you can feel it and it works for people who get hot fast. I gave it 3 stars because the fan is loose and doesn't produce the air it once did and it rattles. Customer service? Yea what customer service? Havent heard back from them yet and had yet to get a clear answer on warranty. I guess overall it's ok but you get what you get from a product made in china. I'm sure the seat costed 15 bucks on Alibaba or Ali Express
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS TREVINO

customer_reviews.title: Needed something to cool my buttocks
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this because $50 seemed like a lot and I thought it wouldn't be worth it. I'm glad I got it though, because it definately works for me. I'm using it on my fake leather office chair which gets hot and causes me to sweat - so I put the fan on low cool and life is good again. Really pleased and I hope it lasts. Been using it for 8 hours a day for a month and so far it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Bore442

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for ~3months in New England winter. Still works great. Takes a couple of minutes to warm up but very reasonable - heats up faster than the AC for comparison. Once it’s hot, it’s realllly hot. The plug is a bit on the flimsy side and can get knocked out of the socket relatively easily but it’s not a huge issue. Material is not particularly soft which is not an issue when wearing winter wear but might not be as comfortable in summer.
customer_reviews.author: M Harary

customer_reviews.title: Best $60 I've spent for my car
customer_reviews.text: I drive a '93 Wrangler that does not have a/c. It's in the mid-90s ever day here, and between having the top down and running this baby on the high fan setting, I can get to work with zero sweating. Very excited to try the heat function this winter. Straps are well designed, hasn't budged in months. If you want a really comfy cushion to sit on, get something else. It's not *uncomfortable*, but you should be buying this for the fan/heat functions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this seat cover! The cooling works right away and even though it’s winter there are times I want it ;-) The heat takes a few minutes to warm up, but then it’s plenty hot even on the lower setting. The cover has been staying in place when I get in and out, no shifting around at all. One review said how the cover sits you up higher in the seat and this it true. I feel like I got 1- 2 extra inches but I actually wanted that and purchased partly for that reason. Very happy I got this!
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Broke LITERALLY after one use.
customer_reviews.text: The heating settings worked when I first plugged it in- the seat portion of the heating element stopped working after the FIRST time. It shuts off automatically for heat every 30 mins so I turned it back on, and the seat no longer heats up. I just received it today so I'm really disappointed in the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: If you share a car... BUY 2!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a month and LOVE IT! I do physical labor and use it in the car on the way home. It's thin and comfortable. You don't even know it there. The only downsides are the heat has just 2 settings where the cool has 3. It gets hot slower than expected but gets very hot when it does. The cool is INSTANT. It is sturdy and quality made doesn't look tacky. Its a very good match in color to my black leather seats in my Mercedes and cloth ones in my truck. I am buying 3 more. It's a great compliment to remote start and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DJ SCRATCH

customer_reviews.title: It works great for me
customer_reviews.text: i specifically chose to try it out on a hot day. It was over 90 degree couple of days ago. It works great for me. I am that type of person who sweats a lot. It is kind of embarrassing to see the back of my shirt is wet. I always have to bring extra shirt to change. This cushion helps me out with the problem. I can feel the air circulating on my back once I turned it on. I definately enjoy summer better.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Barkley

customer_reviews.title: LESS SWEATY BACK! COULD NOT LIVE WITHOUT NOW
customer_reviews.text: WHEN I FIRST RECEIVED I WAS UNDER WHELMED, I just WANTED IT FOR THE COOL FACTOR, I guess I WAS EXPECTING FREZZING AIR TO COME OUT, I was about to send back but then I tired it. COULD NOT LIVE WITH OUT THis. IM IN MY CAR ALL DAY LONG WORKING IN HOME HEALTH CARE, so I TRIED IT AND LOVE IT , MY BACK AND BUTT AND LEGS SWEAT LIKE SERIOUSLY 75% LESS! Love
customer_reviews.author: kayla roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big guy 6’1 260 lbs. I live in VA where the summers get pretty hot. I have leather interior and I work in construction. On the drive home from work each day my legs and lower back would sweat pretty bad. Leaving sweat marks on my pants. Bought this and haven’t had an issue since. Keeps my lower back and upper legs cool and sweat free. I have had it for a few weeks now and couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool for less.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the 1st time today while taking roadtrip through Arizona. I must say that this kept me really cool despite 115 degree weather outside. It comes with all necessary attachments to ensure it is secured your seat. It has 3 cool speeds but I prefer middle option due to amount of air it generates. Overall I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is best adversary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for broke/cheap ppl w/ broken/NO AC
customer_reviews.text: I have an old 90's truck that hasn't had AC for who knows how long already. I wish that I had known about this sooner though because even though only just barely cools you, at least it's something and I think everyone else out there in the world who is too broke to fix their AC and/or lives somewhere really hot would really appreciate it like I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: The fan works great. Keeps you cool. No more sweating against the seat. I have not used the heat mode yet. Excellent product. The seat bands keeps the pad from moving around. Been using it since I got it. Its always on. With the AC on, the cold air keeps my backside cool. The heat works great too. Awesome product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great air flow
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a second one for the passengers side since I was so pleased with mine. There’s a nice flow of air, more so than my spouses factory seats in new vehicle. It’s much more comfortable with the cooling cushion on than without. I haven’t tried the heat as I was only interested in the cooling function. In my vehicle it’s plugged in to “cigarette lighter” and I must turn off when i get out of the car or will continue to run.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooling and heating seat cushion for the 2002 Toyota Camay.It is perfect for me to used in this summer day.The caradapter plug and hand controller is very easy to operate,also it come with a home adapter for use at home if you need.
customer_reviews.author: Yao

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price. It does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the old spring type my dad & grandpa used when I grew up in the 70’s but only found cheap ones that don’t last. This is a bit pricey but it is completely worth every penny. The plastic mesh interior works just like what I grew up with BUT you get a 3 stage cooling fan & a 2 stage heater. I start on high fan & it only takes a few minutes & I switch to low fan. It cools superbly. The heater will warm you right up too. Doesn’t need to stay on high very long.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D Standley

customer_reviews.title: Game-changing
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but made several modifications to improve functionality such as covering the area between thighs towards the front as I do not need the open space in front of me cold lol
customer_reviews.author: Nibblekibble

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for cooling
customer_reviews.text: It might be fine as a seat heater but it didn't work for cooling. It doesn't seem to actually cool the air but it just circulates whatever air is between your knees in the car- that's where the intake fan is- however, I couldn't really feel any significant circulation either. Granted, in the extreme heat of Phoenix, it may just not be cut out for significantly hotter climates.
customer_reviews.author: madmaud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for home and car use
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect product if you want to use it at home or in your car. It comes with both car and home adapter, Give very rich looks to your car seat. Colling works very fast as soon as you start cooling option,save spoiling my shirt as soon as i sit in very hot car as Car AC takes some time to give cool air. Heating takes few secs to get heated Overall happy with my purchase. Shuld have this
customer_reviews.author: SkitMania

customer_reviews.title: GEORGIA SCHOOL BUS DRIVER
customer_reviews.text: In the area in Georgia where I drive a school bus we do not have air conditioning and we started school August 2. Which is HOT! I found this works wonderfully well in the morning when it is a little cooler...but nothing helps that much in the afternoon. However I can tell a difference which is good. At first I wasn't convinced there was an improvement but after a week I do think it helps. But don't expect it to be super cool in extreme heat. I look forward to trying out the heat this winter.
customer_reviews.author: FavoriteCousin

customer_reviews.title: TLDR protruding electronics in the very center of your back.
customer_reviews.text: This is an inferior product. There is some sort of electronics in the very center of your back. This is not designed for comfort. Although it does have heating and cooling features, overall comfort is zero. Why anything would be designed with something in the very center of your back is beyond me. I would definitely not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tjthedj2001

customer_reviews.title: Good heat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our car that is drive everyday for work. We found it takes a while to heat at first but works great once the heat starts. We did find it was a little hard to hook the seat holders in but was able to do it after a few tries. I would recommend this for anyone looking for comfort while driving in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: wonder1

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought two of these and returned one of them because the heater did not work at all. Amazon sent me a replacement quickly and easily. After trying the replacement and the other original one I had, I realized these do not work as advertised. On both of my working seat covers the heater only heats an area of a couple square inches, and even that area does not get very warm. Overall extremely disappointed with the product and I wonder how there are so many good reviews. Save your money and buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Hot or cold, it does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This one I bought for myself. Since I have been working from work and sitting all day, my lower back started to flare up. The day I got it, I set it up and started to use it. The cushion has cooling and heating but I like the heating for my lower back. I will use the cooling setting in the afternoons when the temps do get a little higher. After using this for a couple of weeks, I feel more comfortable sitting down to work from home.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover works great. I've used it in both an office setting and in my car, having both power source options is great. I plan to purchase another so I dont have to keep moving it back and forth, but its lightweight and simple to place so it really isnt too bothersome to move. Great product in would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Thing thing is actually great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cushion. The cooling ability has made it comfortable for me to drive in the hot months! I usually keep it on the lowest setting because even that is enough to keep my back nice and cool. I also like that the cushion is firmer than my seat and gives me a slight boost. It makes it easier to see the road.
customer_reviews.author: Z. K.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made this year!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in social services, so I drive about 10k miles per year. My car has leather seats that don’t breathe so my back side gets sweaty! I took a chance and bought this, despite the somewhat awkward English. I haven’t tried out the heating feature, but the cooling works great! The only downside I see is that the base is slightly too short, causing the fan to stick out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: It works, but could work much better during long drives.
customer_reviews.text: Works decent, but cool function seems to slow after several minutes. If this would maintain constant cooling (not sure if the fan speed is slowing or what, but it does seem to not cool nearly as well after the first few minutes, then after several minutes, starts cooling well again temporarily even though the fan is not blocked). It is nice but does not compare to the factory cooling seat in my truck. Would be nice if it maintained cooling for the entirety of its use over long drives. Heat works well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Fan function works. So no swamp ass. Heater is hit or miss. Seems that it has a hard time regulating the heat. Just when it seems to get hot enough, it turns off. You have remember to check it often to make sure the heat is on. Not the most comfortable seat cushion but for what it is, functional
customer_reviews.author: busted nut cycles

customer_reviews.title: No more sweat marks from hot black leather seats
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat cover... I got a new car lease and the only thing it didn't have was heating or cooling seats. My car is now perfect! It was easy to install and the cooling feels great when I get into my car when it's 90 out and my black leather seats are on fire. I used to get sweaty but not anymore. If I'm being honest it's a bit scratchy on bare legs when wearing shorts but it's the cooling material so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Universal for car or office chair
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprisingly great item to add to my office chair. I spend a lot of time on my chair for work and gaming. My lower body gets really warm quick even with a ceiling fan and room temp of 75. When I found this item it looked it would do a decent job but instead it did a great job keeping my lower body cool. I no longer felt sweat rolling down my backside and now I feel more comfortable during work. Would recommend to anyone who has a above average body temperature.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday. It's starting to heat up here in the Nevada desert. I plugged it in, turned it on and smiled. No more drenched backside. The upper portion doesn't get nearly as much airflow as the seat, but it does get air. My car pumps a small amount of AC to my feet even when the feet vent is off. The fan picks up this cold air and transfers it nicely. I'll know more about the comfort levels when the heat of July arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Bikercj

customer_reviews.title: Best cooling seat I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several cooling cushions and this one is the best so far. Yes it has a fan that pulls your cab air thru ot but most of the time I have my AC on and the air is cool. My back never sweats when I have it on. I do wish the fan hung down lower out of the way and there was some way to make it a tad more comfortable but all in all very satisfied especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SDaddy

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS ADVERTISED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat cushion for my motorhome. I have used this on 2 short trips. I have only used it in the cool mode. The fan feels cool right away and seemed to keep me cool. It kept my back supported, and I didn't feel fatigued or uncomfortable. I would recommend this seat cushion to my friends that didn't have cool/heated seats...
customer_reviews.author: SALMON MUSTACHE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and installed it: installation is very easy with the cables on the right side, closest to inlets. Feels really well (I'm from Texas and we start getting our hot days now). Not really noisy and has 3 speeds of cooling. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Slav

customer_reviews.title: Heat barely works / Loud fan / Hard cushion
customer_reviews.text: Bought thus heated/cooled cushion for work because I have lower back pain most of the day. Highly disappointed. The heat barely gets to warm. I should have just brought my heating pad from home. On the other hand, the cooling function works great. However, the fan is super loud. My other complaint is that the cushion is very hard. I couldn't imagine sitting on it all day. Overall, I give this 1 star because it did not meet any of my expectations. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The features
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heating and cooling seat pad. Small pocket at the bottom is a added bonus. Seems well made with double stitching and more than one option for heat and cooling. Small indifference with the loop straps, should change that, to a strap on the bottom cushion that wraps around the bottom Vehicle cushion
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: It works great, I only gave it 4 stars because there are middle straps and these plastic weirdly shaped clips but we could not figure out how they are supposed to help connect the warmer to the car seat. So the warmer has to be readjusted and straightened up every time we get in. But it isn’t such a big deal that I won’t keep it. There is even a question about it and the response makes no sense there either.
customer_reviews.author: Dooney Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star No Brainer Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I can't believe I didn't order this 5 years ago. This should be an accessory anyone in a hot climate purchases. Level 3 is very strong for thick jeans, level 2 is my go to. Even level 1 is effective. The fan is very quiet at 1 and 2 level, 3rd level is working for your sweaty butt so I just turn the radio up. You sit a little higher and your seat bolsters aren't as effective at holding in tight turns, but that's the trade off. 5-stars still!
customer_reviews.author: Kobe

customer_reviews.title: Good for the summer
customer_reviews.text: My office chair is made with leather. It's pretty cool, but it's really bad during the summer. It's an amazing solution. I'm not hot anymore. To set it up it's literally 10 seconds ( for sure less than the time to write this review ). I recommend at 100%. With 3 modes, the fan is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvain

customer_reviews.title: Better than many others
customer_reviews.text: Good item with moderate air flow Does not actually cool just blows some air through the seat Pro Does blow air Heat works Easy set up Prevents discomfort (back sweat) during a long drive Con Not enough air flow (unless ac is already working)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift to one of my perpetually cold nurses. She uses it on her office chair and loves it. I’m still getting thank you’s and as an added bonus productivity has increased tremendously. I’ll probably order one for my office chair for the cooling.
customer_reviews.author: BTD6555

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product, as it does exactly as it intends - it keeps my back cool and dry on my hot leather seats. The biggest issue with it is that there is a sharp bump in the back portion that digs into my spine, making it uncomfortable even on short drives. It looks to be related to the heating mechanism in the back. I've tried padding it, but this only helps marginally.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Leung

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cover
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover works great. The cooling and heat both work great. One thing i did that you may or may not want to do is I got some bungee cords and hooked them to the bottom of the cover and the bottom of my car seat to hold the bottom in place better, also i folded up the bottom to not cover up the fan letting more air flow freely. now I just have to buy another one for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: dallas jensen

customer_reviews.title: My husband liked
customer_reviews.text: My husband been so excited to has it. But not too long. It’s been stopped working after 1 month use . Bad for me, I can’t return .. sad
customer_reviews.author: Irina Tarankov

customer_reviews.title: Works inconsistently for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the cooling feature within 4 hours it quit working tried it again approximately 3 hours later worked great. The next day dosen't work again really wanted it to work but it is inconsistent going to send back. Great when it works only used the ventilation feature. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Kyken1960

customer_reviews.title: ITS OK
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but definitely could be better. It makes me sit a lot higher then I like and remote definitely cheep doesn’t always work when you click it the cool setting didn’t really work right. Just could be better
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Yancey

product_meta.title: Snailax Car Seat Cushion with 3 Levels Cooling 2 Levels Heating Cool and Heating Pad for Car Truck Home Office
feature_bullets: Cooling Function: Cool Function is ventilation and moisture management for your body.Providing optimum comfort and driving. Special Ventilation layer and Cooling layer battles the heat with breathable quick dry 3D Mesh,so you are always cool and dry.
Fast Heat Up:Dual zone rapid heating,with soothing heat therapy on the back and seat bring warm feeling in the winter.Equipped with Overheat Protection Device remains the stable temperature.

Special Double Layers: Ventilation layer and Cooling layer.Special design solves the problem that vents blocked by human body compared to the normal cooling cushion to effectively eliminate hot sticky seats.

3D breathable mesh Revolutionary new concept 3D Spacer fabric,its upper and lower side are meshes,and the middle is the unique X90 structure made of polyester,giving it the outstanding support force,ventilation functions.
Universal fit,Special design not only for 12 Voltage car but also for 24 Voltage Truck,Boat,Bus.Car adapter is included,Portable for home,office use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
